record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - October 17, 2007)

[Page: S13023]

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Alexander Torres and Young-Min Cho of my staff be granted the privileges of the floor for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Leigh Ann Ross be given the privilege of the floor during consideration of the Labor-HHS bill.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Bingaman, I ask unanimous consent that Jeffry Phan, a fellow in his office, be granted the privileges of the floor for the pendency of H.R. 3043.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
